conclusion: Identify the time intervals when the cars are side by side.
From the graph, cars are side by side at t = 0 s and t = 30 s.
Calculate the distance between the cars at t = 10 s.
At t = 10 s, Car A is traveling at 40 m/s, Car B is accelerating.
Distance traveled by Car A at t = 10 s is 400 m.
Distance traveled by Car B at t = 10 s is 100 m.
Distance between the cars at t = 10 s is 300 m.
Calculate the distance between the cars at t = 20 s.
At t = 20 s, Car A is traveling at 40 m/s, Car B is continuing to accelerate.
Distance traveled by Car A at t = 20 s is 800 m.
Distance traveled by Car B at t = 20 s is 400 m.
Distance between the cars at t = 20 s is 400 m.
Determine the maximum distance between the cars.
The maximum distance between Car A and Car B is 400 m.
